A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Good action but a poor Star Wars movie. I'm not a fan boy or nerd. Just a neutral point of viewer. There are a lot of overly political correct\, racist and sexist themes pushed through here as subliminal messaging. Very forced\, stuff and unnecessary. I just wanted to watch a good movie and relax. I wish these people would stop screwing with entertainment to push their political views and just let people relax and enjoy a good story. 

Snoke finally became important and cool but then was killed off. Rey became distant and hard to connect with. The best change was Fin who finally developed courage and went from essentially being Walt Disney's Goofy in the first film\, to a strong character with purpose in this film. 

Either way. So much done wrong. The real heroes and villains are gone with the weak ones left.
